Deplacement - Class in echecs
Representation of a move
Deplacement(Position, Position, char, char) - Constructor for class echecs.Deplacement
Create a move with two positions, the code of the piece concerned and the color of this piece Used in YetAnotherChessGame mainly
Deplacement(Position, Position) - Constructor for class echecs.Deplacement
Link two positions, mainly used for some tests

Deplacement(String) - Constructor for class echecs.Deplacement
